sentences.en: All elements of the organic whole were integrally linked as expressions of an irreducible essence.
sentences.cn: 有机整体的一切要素作为不能化简的本质而结成一体.

sentences.en: An " irreducible " element is one that can not be quantified.
sentences.cn: “ 不可折算的 ” 因素是一种不能数量化的因素.

sentences.en: Expenditure on road repair has been cut to an irreducible minimum.
sentences.cn: 修路费已削减到不能再减的最低限度了。

sentences.en: Expenditure on road repairs has been cut to an irreducible minimum.
sentences.cn: 修路费已削减到不能再减的最低限度了.

sentences.en: Futures used to be called commodities, the irreducible building blocks of the economy.
sentences.cn: 过去期货叫商品, 是经济中不可缺少的元素.

sentences.en: It is the irreducible seat of strength.
sentences.cn: 这是不可逆的力量的席位.

sentences.en: Let me first address this concept of irreducible complexity.
sentences.cn: 让我先解释一下什么是不能简化的复杂性.

sentences.en: Most important, omega supplies us with an infinite number of these irreducible bits.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是, Ω提供了无穷多个这样的不可约位元值.

sentences.en: Our estimate k - 17 reference your 18 th price irreducible as marker cost increase hardly accepted.
sentences.cn: 请参阅我公司报价单K - 17,18日贵函要求减价,但厂商报价已提高,故难以接受.

sentences.en: PDF - Irreducible polynomials with the primitive polynomial.
sentences.cn: 不可约多项式与本原多项式.

sentences.en: Summary of Background Data . Irreducible atlantoaxial dislocation is typically a chronic process that requires surgical treatment.
sentences.cn: 不可复性寰枢关节脱位是一种典型的慢性进程,需要外科手术干预.

sentences.en: The method of deducing Pythagorean Triples ( irreducible and reducible ) is explained.
sentences.cn: 并说明了互素勾 股数 组的导出方法.

sentences.en: The subdirectly irreducible Clifford semigroups are characterized by means of the structure of congruence.
sentences.cn: 利用Clifford半群上同余的结构,刻画了次直积不可约的Clifford半 群.

sentences.en: This is the irreducible minimum Christians have always believed.
sentences.cn: 这是基督徒一直相信不可退让的最低线.

sentences.en: to cut staff to an irreducible minimum
sentences.cn: 把职员减少到最低限度

words.tran_cn: 不能赎回的；[金融] 不能兑现的；不可救药的

trans.tran_cn: 不能减少的，不能简化的
trans.tran_en: an irreducible sum, level etc cannot be made smaller or simpler
